title: Philip Pettit on Robustly Demanding Goods
itunes:title: Philosophy Bites
description: What is a robustly demanding good, and what has that got to do with friendship and love? Find out in this episode of the Philosophy Bites podcast in which Nigel Warburton interviews Princeton Professor Philip Pettit about this topic.
